Customer Service Chat
Set of 20 All Aluminum Chairs&8 Stainless Steel Tables with Bases
#ASF-701-SET-2 $1410.00 ASF-701 All-Aluminum Patio Chair $42.00 Square Stainless Steel Table Top with Base $65.00 ASF-701-SET-1 Set of 10 All Aluminum Patio Chairs&5 Stainless Steel Table Tops with Bases $745.00 ASF-702-SET-2 Set of 20 Black Rattan Chairs&8 Stainless Steel Tables with Bases $1410.00
Our outdoor patio furniture set was created in order to cater for our customers needs. As part of our long experience in furnishing various dining venues we recognize the importance of a well-planned venue.
For this reason, we decided to save you time and money by allowing you to benefit from previous experience and order these patio items as a ready-made set. This aluminum and stainless steel patio set will look great in any outdoors setting as well as in an ice-cream parlor or fast food restaurant.
The set includes:
(20) ASF-701 All-Aluminum Patio Chair (6) 28" x 28" and (2) 36" x 36" Stainless Steel Table Tops with Bases
We are certain that this set of all-aluminum chairs and stainless steel tables will ease your job when furnishing your venue. If, however, you are in need of a different number of items or simply wish to purchase them individually, check the following links:
All-Aluminum Patio Chair (#ASF-701)
Stainless Steel Table Top with Base
Please note that the table tops and bases are shipped separately and light assembly is required. Delivery Time 7-14 Days Price $1410.00 Quantity
